Feat Changes


Barbarian Rages:

ALL RAGES:
 Level Modifier: 1= +2, 10= +3, 20= +4, 30= +5, 40= +6
 Duration: (Level Modifier * CON mod) Duration

Barbarian Rage / Greater Rage
 -2 AC +2 AB if less than Level 15
 -1 AC +4 AB if less than Level 40
 -0 AC +6 AB = Level 40

 Discipline Bonus = Constition Modifier / 2 
 STR & CON Bonus = Level Modifier * 2
 Will Saves Bonus = 3 + Level Modifier

Thundering Rage Add-On:
 2d8, 2d10 or 2d12 Sonic damage (Level Mod 4,5,6)
 Reflex Saves Bonus = Level Modifier
 Main weapon gains On Hit Deafness DC 14 + Level Modifier * 2 (18 min, max 26)

Terrifying Rage Add-On:
 Terrifying Rage Pulse every 4 rounds for Duration of Rage
 DC = Barbarian Level + Intimidate Skill Rank / 2
 On Failed Will Save
  if Level = BarbarianLevels = Fear 1-3 rounds, % chance of Fear Paralysis
  if Level = BarbarianLevels * 2 =  AC / Saves Decreased by 2 for 2-4 rounds

Mighty Rage:
 Weapons gain 2d8, 2d10 or 2d12 Massive Criticals damage (Level Mod 4, 5, 6)
 (BarbLevel*BarbLevel)/8 Temporary Hitpoints (50-200)
 (LevelModifier-2) AB (2-4)
 LevelModifier Fort Saves (4-6)
 LevelModifier Initimidate (4-6)
 1+LevelModifier Elemental Resistance (5-7)

Mighty rage and greater rage stack. Normal rage and greater rage do not stack. Epic rages (Thundering, Terrifying) are applied to normal rage and not to mighty rage.

Bone Skin: Disabled

Death Arrow: DC = 20 + Arcane Archer Levels.

Deathless Mastery Touch:  DC = 17 + Palemaster Class Level.

Disarm & Improved Disarm - Weapon falls into Targets inventory.

Imbue Arrow: Damage =  Arcane Archer Class Level * d6.
Feat Changes

To socket a gem into a socket item, use the gem's unique power and target the socket item. 
If you use the socket item's unique power, it will display the amount of sockets available on that item.
How to Socket Items

nItemLevel is the Equipped Item's Restricted Level.
nGPValue is the Equipped Item's Gold Piece Value

Item Level Restrictions - Chart

MAKE SURE YOU LEAVE THE ONE INVENTORY TAB AVAILABLE IN THE EVENT ALL YOUR ITEMS BECOMES UNEQUPPED.  YOU HAVE SIX TABS SO NO EXCUSES FOR GEAR THAT IS LOST DUE TO SCRIPT UNEQUIPPING!

Ammunition is excluded from ILR Script.

If you are caught with an item that is forbidden, it will be confiscated with notice without a refund.

Illegal gear for example be anything that exceeds what the pop-up message in Astral Plane displays such as...

>= +7 on AB, AC, EB
>= +3 Regeneration
>= +7 Saving Throws, Ability Points, Skill Points
>= -10 Damage Resistance
On Hit Property(except Disarm with whip)
On Hit Cast Spell
Anything with Immunity(except Subraces)
Anything with Feats
Anything with True Seeing(except Shifter hides)

You cannot sell items directly to a Merchant EXCEPT for the Market Merchant.  
However, you can drop an item for gold, an that item is sent to the Market to be for sale by the Market Merchant. 
If you want to split loot with your party, use the Party Loot Splitter in Home.  
All items unacquired will be sent to the market.  
Every hour the market purges its inventory. 
Items are bought at a rate of 10% of there value.
Merchants

Acceptable DM Punishments

1.  Verbal Warning
2.  Death
3.  Loss of XP/GP
4.  Jail
5.  Loss of ITEMS
6.  Current character DELETED       
7.  All character's DELETED
8.  Temporary Banishment (based on Milliorn an Staff)
9.  Permanent Banishment (discretion of Milliorn)
Punishment

1.  No Griefing.  This is defined as...
The unfair use or abuse of a game mechanic that was not intended by the game's developers. 
The inability of the victim to exact some means of retribution beyond utilizing similar unintended game mechanics. 
The intended purpose of an act of griefing must be to negatively impact the game play of another person. 
     
Players will often consider the following actions to constitute griefing: kill stealing, player killing(repeatedly), spamming, team killing (or team wounding), door or path blocking, ninja looting, spawn camping, and corpse camping.

2.  No resurrecting a player(especially after PK'ing them) with intent to PK them.

3.  You may run from a PvP fight.

4.  Do not hunt Players unless they have bounties.  You may PK them but excessive tracking a player that does not have a bounty can be considered Griefing, an Harrasment.

5.  Do not Camp an area with intent to PvP.  You must keep transisting map to map(but not exploiting the transistion areas).

6.  Never set a Trap, or go Hostile on a Spawn Point or Area Transistion.

7.  No Pickpocketing in Arena(Script Enforced).

8.  No Spamming the same Hostile Feat or Spell(including Meta-Magic).  You are allowed one use per round.  This means both parties must roll there there First Roll of the round before you may use the Same Feat or Spell again.  Meta-magic spells count towards same spell(such as IGM's an Meta-magic IGM's are treated as same spell, PvP Only).
 
9.  No Spamming Pickpocket anytime!  Once per turn(60 seconds).  Dungeon Masters are notified of every theft made.  If you try to pickpocket more than once a minute you are subject to being punished(Script Enforced).
PvP Rules

A Carpathian Nightmare Ruleset

1.  A DM can enforce a new rule at anytime, written or verbal.  Do not argue or contest it.  If you have a problem with it, contact the forums an post your thoughts there.

2.  A DM is always right and has the final judgement.  Do not contest the DM's in game.  They inside the game are always right.  To dispute an debate about the matter,  login to the forums an post there.

3.  Any hostile actions are ONLY allowed in PVP areas, 

4.  NO harrassing/griefing players.  This means verbally especially.  

5.  NO SETTING TRAPS IN NO PVP AREAS!  You will be punished severly by script if you do so.

6.  NO farming or camping.  (This means NO herding or hording creatures together.

7.  NO boss camping.  Kill the boss an port out of the area an start the entire area over(Script Enforced).

8.  DM's will NOT replace any cash or items so do NOT ask or complain.  

9.  Use the Carpathian Bank at your own risk.  No refunds!

10.  NO abusing Bugs, Exploits, Haks, Cheats.....nothing!

11.  Do not harrase players in Tell Channel.  
  
12.  NO swearing or spamming on shout.  Extreme foul language is prohibited regardless of how often in shout.  

13.  NO spamming Area of Effect Spells as defined exclusively as Chain, Bullet, or Infinite Casting.

14.  No disturbing someones bank chest when that chest is open.
Server Ruleset

Special Thanks to all that did whatever to support me in this including DM's, Testers, an people that met me on other servers that have come to play my module :) 

Here is a list of people that contributed material to the NWN Community that made this module possible.

APS/ NWNX2 / Leto - Dragonsong, Papillion, an Avlis Team
Higher Ground Legendary Levels & Simtools - FunkySwerve of Higher Ground
Omega Forge - OmegaDM
All can be downloaded on the NWN IGN Vault.  Highly recommended, well tested.  Vote a 10 if you appreciate the work.

Lots of thanks to Elwoodini for hosting ACN v1 & v2.  
Thanks to Karyn & Qwen for hosting the Beta Module v2.
Thanks to Scarface for Subrace System & Socket System
Special Thanks

Blackstaff:  +6 Enhancement Bonus + On-Hit Dispell DC 26

Bigby Spells:  All except Interposing Hand Respect a new Discpline Check if you fail your SR check.  All Bigby spells have a duration of Caster Level / 4.

All Dispell Magic:
InnateLevel: Lesser=3, Dispel=5, Greater=7, Mords=9 
DispelLevel: Lesser=1, Dispel=2, Greater=3, Mords=4 
Caster DC Formula = d20() + SpellFocuses + CasterLevel - (9-InnateLevel) 
Effect Creator DC Formula = 16 + SpellDefenseBonus + CasterLevel 

By Spell, Caster gets: 
Lesser = -15 levels 
Dispel = -10 levels 
Greater = -5 levels 
Mords = straight lvl v lvl dispel with a Breach twist of some sort we can hammer out later.

Epic Spell - Epic Warding:  Damage Reduction 20/+20) up to 50 * (Caster Level / 2) Damage.  Lasts 1 round per level   
Fear:  All Fear spells except Barbarian Rage Fear has a maximum duration of d3 rounds.

Greater Sanctuary:  This spell is disabled due to no saving throw

Greater Restoration: does not heal anymore

Harm - 10 points of damage per caster level (max. of 400 at level 40).  On successful will save, harm deals half this amount, but it cannot reduce the target's hit points to less than 1.  If used on an undead creature, harm acts like heal.

Heal - 10 hit points per caster level (max. of 400 hit points at level 40)  Heal will not remove neg. levels or permanent ability score damage.  If used on an undead creature, heal acts like harm.

Isaacs Greater Missile Storm: Up to 20 missiles, each doing 1d6 damage to each target in area.

Mass Heal: Same as 'Heal' but all members in the radius gain the effect.

Mestil's Acid Sheath & Elemental Shield do not stack.  Mestil's damage is 1d6 +  (Caster Level / 2)

Time Stop:  Respects Reflex Save against all targets within a 30 meter range.  DC = Caster Level + Spell DC - d20.  Duration = 12 seconds(two rounds).

Tensers Transformation: HP exploit fixed.  Cannot Stack HP anymore.

True Seeing:  Cast See Invisibility.  If you are 38 Level Caster Class, or 40 Ranks in Listen or Spot, you will be granted See Invisiblity, Ultravision, Listen & Spot Bonus equal to Caster Levels.

True Strike: 12 seconds duration,

Wildshape(Druid/Shifter):  Equipped items mesh with your shifted form.  AC does not stack.  

Word of Failth:  Respects Will Save Throws now.
Spell Changes

Aoe spells will not stack!  You may only cast one AoE in a radius of 35 meters.
All AoE spells with a heartbeat script respects Full PvP, yet the module will remain globally a Party PvP settting.  The following is a list of them.

Acid Fog
Blade Barrier
Cloud of Bewilderment
Cloud Kill
Entangle
Evards Black Tentacles
Grease
Incendiary Cloud
Stinking Cloud
Stonehold
Storm of Vengeance
Wall of Fire
Web
Spell Changes - AoE

August 2nd, 2008

Letoscript features fixed.
Deathlogging exploit fixed along with the persistant stats script(was broken for an unknown time).

August 1st, 2008

New Character validation tweaked(item stripper was broken with new character files).
Name Validator fixed(again).
Miscellaneous Shop Items Updated.  If more items still need charges adjusted post on forums please.
Imbue Arrow damage now grows according to how many Arcane Archer levels taken(Class Level * d6).
Death Arrow for Arcane Archer changed to DC = 20 + Arcane Archer Levels.
Omega Forge NPC's all set to Plot.  No idea how they changed but there fixed now.
Rakshasa Staff taken out of the Gauntlet Shop.  Shifter items are not allowed for use with non-Shifters.  Error on my part, sorry.
Item Deposit Box Room will now delete items left in the room after 10 minutes of no PC's in the area.

July 24th, 2008

Module OnClientEnter Script fixed.  Should gain the proper items now when logging in.
PC Name Validator Updated.  Only restrictions now are against foul words in character names, or multiple instances of the same .BIC files.
GP/XP Bank fixed.  Old accounts are archived.  A log of all accounts are posted on the forums with the keys to those accounts to identify them.  A DM will assist in refunding the GP/XP if your key is on that log on forums.
Updates

3.0 Compliant UMD / Spellcraft script enabled.  


Spellcraft DC = 25
Base UMD Scroll DC = 20
Spellcraft Penalty DC = 5 (If you fail a check by more than this amount you are penalized.
UMD Penalty DC = 5
Damage Penalty = 3d20
Random Effects on Failure: 1 of 25

If players have either a UMD or Spellcraft skill level
of 5 or higher and they have both skills, they recieve
a synergy bonus.  This will result in the player (or you)
seeing a skill level 2 higher than on the character sheet
because BW does not account for this synergy even though
it is a standard 3E rule.  The code then appropriately decides
which skill to use (either craft or UMD) after this synergy
adjustment is made.
Use Magic Device(UMD)

Welcome to A Carpathian Nightmare!

The server was originally built, programmed and created by Milliorn. Maps where built with help from Sarah Milliorn. Since then, due to changes in circumstances, it has been taken over by Dorrian and Shimmer. They are working on the continued development of the module.


170+ areas to explore.  Mainly Hak n' Slash.  Has quest areas for those that want to do something other than slaughter pc's or npc's.

60+ Subraces
Legendary Levels(60)
GP XP Item Bank

Full Crafting Shop

Welcome to ACN v2

Bonus XP/GP reward for the dealing the killing blow to the creature is 10%.
 XP & GP bonus per player in the party is 10% per player.
Distance between each party member and the dead creature to be included for XP reward is 40.0 meters.
Party level gap for minimal XP is  10. 
XP pentalty for each summon/familiar/henchman within the party  is 2%.
XP to be divided between all PC's in the party within the specified distance of 40.0 meters.
Minimum XP possible for all PC's  is 1 XP
Legendary Levels are not calculated in this.
No Multiclass Penalty 2da edit in effect.
